description: Number of stable forests with n nodes.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
K. L. McAvaney, Counting stable trees, pp. 79-85 of Combinatorial Mathematics (Proceedings 2nd Australian Conf.), Lect. Notes Math. 403, 1974.
formula: G.f.: Sum_{n>=1} Z(S_n,s(x)) where s(x) is the g.f. for A003426 and Z(S_n) is the cycle index of the symmetric group on n elements. - _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 13 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 13 2016
